description: This cluster is for assigning artifacts tags that are just below the level of strategic language, but above the terminology used at the tactical level of cybersecurity.  This cluster in particular aligns to terminology used to describe environmental threats to cybersecurity.
name: ENVIRONMENTAL-THREAT
source: The HITRUST Threat Catalogue v1 and the ENISA Threat Taxonomy

values.description: Prolonged period of abnormally low rainfall, and a shortage of water causing damage to assets.
values.value: OSRS CMCF Operational Framework: HITRUST TC PFC1	Drought
